shared.network

Class MethodRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.network.MethodRouter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Router

    public class MethodRouter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Router

    This class will route the method calls, using the provided method name

    See Also:
    Router

    • Constructor Detail

      • MethodRouter

    • Method Detail

      • route

        public java.lang.Object route(java.lang.Object callee,
                              java.lang.String methodName,
                              java.lang.Object[] argList)
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Method implemented from the interface Router
        Specified by:
        route in interface Router
        Parameters:
        callee - object on which the method will be called; it must be either an instance of SharedProxyClient or SharedProxyServer
        methodName - text representing the method name: it must be the same as the method name declared in the corresponding interface
        argList - list of arguments used, together with the methodName, to build the method's complete signature; thus, it is very important to provide the arguments in the correct order
        Returns:
        if the called method has a return value, it is also passed as return value of the route method in case of a void method call, null is returned
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if NetworkRmi.remotize(Object, Integer) has been called, passing e as first parameter, this exception could occur, since an RMI call will take place
        See Also:
        Router.route(Object, String, Object[])
